name: FEED ME ESSENCE (Ludum Dare 44)
description:
My submission for Ludum Dare 44 - "FEED ME ESSENCE"

The idea is that you need to feed the demon lord life essense, but be careful, he's not afraid to suck up all of your life force too! Run about the level and collect life force from bushes. However, nature may not like you disturbing the balance...

This was made entirely by me, save for the dungeon tileset which I got from: https://opengameart.org/content/dungeon-tileset

CONTROLS:

WASD / Arrows - Move

Left Click - Succ the life force out of bushes.
